model_details.description: An implementation of a BERT based model (Shi et al, 2019) with some modifications (no additional parameters apart from a linear classification layer), which is currently the state of the art single model for English PropBank SRL (Newswire sentences). It achieves 86.49 test F1 on the Ontonotes 5.0 dataset.
